data.text: @GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS Spend, spend, spend. Where is our tax cut ??
@GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS I’m sorry, did you say you’re giving millions of dollars to doctors??

@GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS It would better for you to grovel and beg for forgiveness for your transgressions against the children of Rhode Island than tell us we need to clean up your mess. But rest assured, we will clean it up when we vote you out during the primary.
@landry4gurlz @GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS They already gave us what we’re getting. Threatened and terminated. Sadly a good screwing is all you can expect. Maybe a few lights on the statehouse
@GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS You and your predecessor brought on this catastrophe by your poor leadership. The past two years will not be forgotten and those who are responsible for this disaster.

@landry4gurlz @GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS Comrade, LOL, I get it! Because Governor McKee wants all production and property to be owned by the state, right? Is that it? Hahaha LOL you hit it right on the head, clearly that's what he wants!!!
@GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS Great! Now, do first responders comrade!

@GovDanMcKee @RIEOHHS Bribes for votes.  You sat on OUR rescue money for a full year. You’ve barely done anything to help the arts. I’m just absolutely finished. I cannot wait to vote for one of your primary challengers
